body_text2:
Sketch project includes work on creating a Moodboard (collages) of the future interior, (after the stage of the planning solution*) selection of materials, furniture, lighting and creation of a shopping list.

*Sketch project includes all stages of the planning solution.
body_text4:
• After payment, we send you a brief to fill out
  • You will need to send all the necessary dimensions of your room/apartment/house.
body_text6:
• After completing the planning solution stage, collages of the future interior are created based on your preferences
  • Specific materials, plumbing, furniture, lighting are selected within the budget agreed with you.
  • We consult and finalize
  • We make a list of finishing materials, lighting, furniture and decorative items to bring the project to life
body_text8:
Children's room for a girl
City7, Germany
